dishes.name: Classic Cheeseburger
dishes.description: Juicy beef patty topped with melted cheese, lettuce, tomato, and pickles, served with fries.

dishes.name: BBQ Bacon Burger
dishes.description: Beef patty smothered in tangy barbecue sauce, topped with crispy bacon, cheddar cheese, and onion rings.

dishes.name: Portobello Mushroom Burger
dishes.description: Grilled portobello mushroom served on a bun with lettuce, tomato, red onion, and garlic aioli.

dishes.name: Ribeye Steak
dishes.description: Juicy and flavorful ribeye steak cooked to perfection, served with mashed potatoes and seasonal vegetables.

dishes.name: Filet Mignon
dishes.description: Tender filet mignon grilled to your preference, served with asparagus and hollandaise sauce.

dishes.name: Black and Blue Steak Salad
dishes.description: Sliced blackened steak served over mixed greens with blue cheese crumbles, tomatoes, and balsamic vinaigrette.

dishes.name: Veggie Burger
dishes.description: Plant-based burger patty made with black beans, mushrooms, and spices, served with avocado and sprouts.

dishes.description: Flavorful New York strip steak grilled to perfection, served with garlic mashed potatoes and saut√©ed spinach.

dishes.name: Western Bacon Burger
dishes.description: Beef patty topped with crispy onion rings, barbecue sauce, cheddar cheese, and bacon, served on a toasted bun.

dishes.name: Grilled Chicken Steak
dishes.description: Tender grilled chicken breast seasoned with herbs and spices, served with roasted potatoes and green beans.

dishes.name: Bison Burger
dishes.description: Lean and flavorful bison patty topped with caramelized onions, Swiss cheese, and arugula.

dishes.name: Sirloin Steak
